name: Avinash Sable
biography: Avinash Sable is an Indian track and field athlete specializing in the 3000 meters steeplechase. He holds the national record in the event and has made significant achievements in international competitions, including winning a gold medal at the 2022 Asian Games and a silver medal at the 2022 Commonwealth Games.
childhood: Avinash Sable was born into a farming family in Mandwa, Maharashtra. He had to walk or run long distances to school due to a lack of transportation, which contributed to his athletic development. He later joined the Indian Army, where he received formal training in athletics.
professional_career: Sable has broken the Indian national record in the 3000 meters steeplechase multiple times, achieving a personal best of 8:11.20 at the 2022 Commonwealth Games. He was the first Indian to qualify for the Olympic Games in the steeplechase event at the Tokyo 2020 Olympics and is a strong contender for medals at the 2024 Paris Olympics.
